nodes.text: The WorkStar Repulsorlift Skiff, also known as a Drogue, was a series of repulsorlift manufactured by Aratech Repulsor Company.

Alliance Special Forces modified these skiffs to carry two passengers, whose combined weight would cut into the Drogue's cargo capacity. Quiet to operate and with appreciable cross-country performance, SpecForce operatives were known to use these skiffs during special operations.
